thread.title: Puerto Rico Promises Better Oversight
thread.title_full: Puerto Rico Promises Better Oversight - WSJ

author: Aaron Kuriloff
title: Puerto Rico Promises Better Oversight
text:
Puerto Rico Governor Alejandro Garcia Padilla has proposed legislation to create a local fiscal control board, an attempt to rebuild investor faith in the U.S. commonwealth as it prepares to restructure its $72 billion of debt.
The proposed board would be independent and nonpolitical, with oversight over the commonwealth’s government and most of its agencies, according to a news release from the island’s Government Development Bank.... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
